Articles.Content:
I would like to take a minute to dedicate my 3.000th post to:

the devs at Squad - we all know them, the KSP modders big and small - to many to name, the helpful and patient community members - here and elsewhere; commemorating my almost two years of KSP addiction and enjoyment - many might call this a short time.

Closing with the words of the involuntary KSP icon Scott Manley: Fly safe!

Post padding slacker

I'd raise a glass to Squad. I don't think they've done everything right, but they haven't done everything WRONG either, and I'd say for every wrong thing, they've done about three right things (75%). And given the low cost of KSP, that's a very good value.
Congratulations. But as this is not about the game itself, the thread has been moved to the Space Lounge.
